description: Hitme's visual novel set on Santiago de Chile. A kind of homoerotic fantasy full of fascinating colors and music. It's Friday's night, Nam's looking for someone to beat him. A suicidal act that will save his life when he meets Astra and Dei, two kind boys who will take care of him.

name: Lords of Solitaire
description: Solve ingenious solitaire puzzles and beat the Lords. The Lords have replaced your playing cards with stackable puzzle pieces. Some pieces have suit and number markings, but some don't. Use the shape and color of a piece to determine it's stacking order. Discover the secrets of the Lords!

name: Bite Sized Puzzle
description: Bite Sized Puzzle is a point and click puzzle game about investigating your kitchen to see what secrets it holds!

name: Laruaville 11 Match 3 Puzzle
description: That's not your regular Match3 game! It requires strategy. Unique game play, plus the town to build, a story and bonus games!

name: Toru
description: Toru is a bullet-hell platformer where absolutely everything that falls into your hands becomes a weapon! Boxes, crystals, bombs and even the enemies themselves! Your success depends only on your skill!

name: Psychic Guardian Super Splendor
description: After being captured by a mysterious group, university student Nagisa Kujo hears a voice in her head telling her she needs to escape. She also discovers that when she presses a button on her belt, she becomes clad in combat gear. With her newfound power, Nagisa fights to stop evil.

name: Cat Packs
description: Follow the Cat Packs on their first adventure. Travel across forests, beaches, mountains, lakes and rivers to discover the source of the Mechanized Menace threatening the Golden Burrow. Cat Packs combines elements from action, adventure, platformer, shooter, sci-fi, and multi-player co-op games.

name: Way Back Witness
description: 《归路：见证 Way Back Witness》是一款架空世界回合制RPG游戏。 玩家扮演“异界来访者”马次娜·骸，见证忒瑞阴德上的是是非非。在这不属于自己的世界中踏上那注定不平凡的归路。

name: Nkodice
description: NKODICE is an adaptation of a traditional Japanese dice game, which is called Chinchirorin, developed by KSYM in Japan.

name: Mega Man Star Force DX
description: Mega Man Star Force DX is a mod for Mega Man Star Force 1 that completely modernizes the game. It includes many new features, changes and tweaks throughout the entire game that bring the game up to speed with MMSF2 and MMSF3. This mod aims to create more gameplay depth and replayability, unify all three versions of the game, reduce the reliance on multiplayer, and much more.

name: Coin Dash
description: Coin Dash is a time based coin collecting game that makes addictive. Be sure to avoid the dangerous cactus or your game is over!

name: Strike Daz Cans
description: Aim! Strike! Knock Down! The target of the game is knocking down the cans with as less throws as possible. This may sound easy, and it is early levels, but you'll have to cope with moving objects in higher levels making the game increasingly difficult. The game stores your progression in persistant storage alllowing you to suspend a play and take it over whenever your want.

name: Dreams and Nightmares
description: Dreams and Nightmares, A CGDC Community game, is a purely free multiplayer Action RPG where 4 modern-day friends share in the dreams and visions found in the Book of Daniel.

name: MP3: Yoshi's Galapagos
description: Sin descripción

name: MP1: Minecraft Madness
description: Sin descripción

name: Amairo Chocolate 2
description: Yunagicho, a town lined with Western-style homes. The previous autumn was when Yuzuki came to this town and met the animal eared girls and started working with them at Cafe Setaria.

name: Aikagi 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Hansel and Gretel
description: A Fantasy Puzzle-Adventure game, Based on the fairytale "Hansel and Gretel". Play as both Hansel & Gretel, Solve puzzles, Collect items, Meet magical creatures and live happily ever after!

name: Fire Emblem: Four Kings - Deposition
description: This is Four Kings: Deposition, a short prequel to Four Kings! This story is centered around Daltry, one of the main antagonists of Four Kings, and shows how he began and how he became the man he is in the main story. Of the three main antagonists of Four Kings, I felt that Daltry was the weakest one, since he didn’t receive a lot of screentime or backstory, and his few appearances were kinda generic, so I wanted to remedy that with a new story all about him.

name: Funbag Fantasy 4: Brother Astor
description: Funbag Fantasy 4: Brother Astor is the fourth entry in the main Funbag Fantasy, set in an alternative 13th century, 400 years earlier than the events of the first game, in the Kingdom of Litovia on the territory of modern Hungary.

name: Space Escape Obstacles
description: Try to avoid the obstacles and conquer all the levels/worlds.

name: For Rest
description: A low-poly walking simulator that puts you into a desolate, fully-greyscale forest that is devoid of life. While moving through this world, you must destroy blinking, disruptive roots that are burdening your path and the space around you. Sometimes these roots spawn new life, and sometimes a human, Charlie, appears. As you play through, the world will gradually saturate and life will begin to populate around you.

name: Star Wars Galaxies Restoration
description: A non-profit, fan-made, community-driven remaster of the classic MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided. Featuring a return to the multi-profession system and the combat style of the Combat Upgrade, combined with all NGE content and expansions, and regularly published new and exciting content additions and quality of life improvements, this classic free-to-play is ready to take you back to the best Star Wars Saga ever told: Yours.

name: Destruction Rocks
description: Game in which players control rocks that can destroy physics objects.

name: Staxter
description: This game is a spiritual successor to Kirby Star Stacker. Enjoy levels of great size, or intense restriction. Chill with an endless mode, or try to speed run it! A relaxing game about the garden, enjoy the sounds of the woods, while using your bug friends to collect the flowers. Sandwich flowers or buds between two matching bug friends to collect them! Or, sandwich special blocks, like the watering well or the lawn mower to use special effects.

name: Putrid Shark
description: A game by Carly Besterman featuring an original chiptune soundtrack by Putrid Shark (the band). Putrid Shark was a joke gone too far made on a 3-week deadline.

name: Mergest Kingdom
description: We haven’t released any merge games on our site so far, so it’s high time to fix the flaw. Welcome to the magic kingdom plagued by a dark force. Match 3 items to create a new object and help to restore the realm. A mix of simulation and match 3 games, this free merge game online will appeal to both children and adult audiences. Fantasy artwork and relaxing matching gameplay makes makes it pure fun to play full screen without download. Create new items and unlock more characters, reclaim new parts of the map and enjoy the evermerge game online for free.

name: Inside Out
description:
Jump into the bizarre tale of Inside | Out, a recursive first-person adventure set under a mysterious dome.

The world around you is contained within itself, an infinite loop where actions in one variant of the world affects the other copies.

Progress and transform the environment around you, bring items into the smaller world to scale them up and use their larger form to advance in the adventure.

Will you manage to escape this perpetual world?

name: Timelie: Game of the Year Edition
description:
Timelie is a stealth puzzle adventure, where you control time like a media player. Perceive future events to plan your escape strategy from the past, sneak an enemy, and manipulate time through this companionship journey of a mysterious cat and a little girl with a precognitive power.

Timelie: Game of the Year Edition includes:
- a copy of the base game
- a copy of the Hell Loop DLC

name: Hentai Beach Girls
description: Visit sunny beach with the cutest girls walking around. But your intentions are very vulgar. Use beach balls to knockdown girls and kidnap them with drones.

name: Family Mysteries Collection
description:
This bundle includes:
- Family Mysteries: Poisonous Promises
- Family Mysteries 2: Echoes of Tomorrow
- Family Mysteries 3: Criminal Mindset

name: Simulator Pack: Car Mechanic Simulator and Gold Rush: The Game - Double Bundle
description:
Get two realistic simulators with DOUBLE BUNDLE including: CAR MECHANIC SIMULATOR and GOLD RUSH: THE GAME.
Become the best car mechanic or make your gold mining dream come true - or both!

name: Zombie Freaks
description: Fast paced retro shooting fps action. Explore the dark tunnels of a paramilitary Siberian base. Kill the mutant zombie freaks within. Find the key to the next level of blood soaked insanity. Unleash the brutal killing machine within you. Take no prisoners.

name: Love n War: Warlord by Chance
description: Warlord by Chance is a tactical RPG. Your destiny is to become a warlord. Build your economy, recruit gorgeous heroic girls, upgrade units, and immerse in stimulating love tales. Stand, Fight and Create your own dynasty, my lord.

name: Adriatic Pizza
description: Adriatic Pizza is a peaceful pizzayolo 3D simulator. In a world inspired by Porco Rosso, explore islands, deliver pizzas, meet wonderful characters and watch out for your Seaplane fuel !

name: Hero Park
description: Create the perfect illusion of an adventure town with blacksmiths, taverns, and dungeons with monsters bred by you. Meet epic characters who want to join you and use their skills to lure the hero's gold out of their purses. Make Hero Park what it used to be: the most magnificent town in the kingdom!

name: FreeRunners
description: This goal of the game is a 3-D platforming to race on selection of maps in order to compete for the fastest time and play with others online. The game has a simple objective and was made to be enjoyed with friends or alone if you wanted to see if you could get the fastest time.

name: Suffering
description: Suffering is a very difficult turn-based RPG with a unique system. The main character is an ordinary human that accidentally fell into the Room of Suffering, and players won't be able to return to the mortal realm unless they defeat every Sinner in the Room of Suffering.

name: Seance
description: A funny Manga-style detective game about two detectives who use supernatural powers to solve murder mysteries that are too difficult for the police to handle alone.

name: Love of Dragons
description: Why do dragons dream about red clouds?

name: Sylphine
description: Discover your destiny in a world where two dimensions collide in a conflict that threatens all life. Explore two unique dimensions, cultivate friendships, and form relationships as you delve into the world of Sylphine!

name: Hot Pot VR
description: Hot pot is an engaging cooking game that give you the chance to travel the world on a food truck! Are you able to cook every world recipe? Test and improve your skills! You can also challenge your online friends and other players! Who will cook much more dishes in the in the shortest possible time?

name: Dragon Break Classic Head to Head
description: Dragon Break Classic Head to Head is a retro arcade game that lets 1 and 2 players play head to head in a competitive arcade environment. Unique animated pixel bricks tumble down toward the users paddle along with Mini-Bosses and Powerups. Collect powerups as you progress through the levels and defeat your opponent. Thirty Levels to compete in and battle mini bosses on your way to victory in single player and two player modes.

name: Albacete Warrior
description: Albacete Warrior is a satirical combat game where you take on the role of Benito Waters, ninja from Albacete, Spain, in his worldwide adventure on an important task given to him by his master, Paco sensei. With his trusty companion, friend and also main weapon, Pepito the chicken, cockslap waves of enemies whose only wish is to see you dead and fulfill the ancient prophecy to become the chosen one, like many that have come before him. Being the chosen one doesn’t really seem very special but it does sound fun.

name: Zero Hour
description: A game made in 2009 and released in 2021 in itch.io's Indie Bundle for Palestinian Aid.

name: The Altered Lands
description: Start your journey in a dark medieval world. Prepare to face challenging enemies with swords, bows, and powerful spells. You can choose whether to sneak as a stealth or perhaps by fighting fiercely with the long Sword.

name: Leyline Knights
description: Leyline Knights is an elemental action roguelike about fighting to reach the top of the Great Tree in search of magic. Wield arcane magic & swift swordsmanship to fight for your ailed sibling.

name: Fairy Godmother Stories: Puss in Boots Collector's Edition
description: The Ministry of Discipline needs you, Fairy Godmother!

name: Dog Fox Bunny
description: Play the game from a dog's point of view.

name: Erotic Jigsaw Puzzle 2
description: Challenging 6 x 6 jigsaw puzzle featuring hardcore sex scenes by Lolita LineArt, on a smooth luxury graphical background.

name: Black Smith 3
description: You are a blacksmith in a small rural village. You steadfastly earn your living by hammering out products daily, but at night, you take your earnings and go to town to seek out innocent and cute girls. Continue improving your experience and skills, so that you can raise the price of your products.

name: Ghost College
description: An average college girl takes an elective class and everything is different. Death, spooky, enveloped her, uncovering the truth, looking for clues, making the right choice was the only way.

name: Minotaur Maze
description: Minotaur Maze is a simple action puzzle game about navigating a maze and avoiding a monster. Somewhere out there lurking, The Minotaur is honing in on your location and hunting you down! With each new level, the difficulty increases because the maze gets larger and the Minotaur gets faster.

name: Craps at Aces Casino
description: Snake Eyes! Test your luck of the dice in a Vegas Style craps game. Multiple Craps tables to pick from. Bonus scratcher games for easy wins.

name: The hidden game society
description: The hidden game society is a digital escape room experience. You have been invited to be a member of this mysterious club. You will find yourself alone and trapped in this curious board game-themed room full of atmosphere. Use your wit and deduction skills to find a way out.

name: Fluffy Gore
description: Fluffy Gore is a Rogue-lite action rpg, the main theme is the contraposition between cute and blasphemous.

name: Acheron's Souls
description:
Acheron’s Souls is a turn-based strategy game, which contains board game elements and in which several fighters face off to be the last to survive in the arena. Stream the game and play with 8 friends even if they don't have the game in their library!

Acheron's Souls has a buch of heroes with a background that details them and with which we can understand the reasons that move them to fight in each battle. Up to 8 players can duel simultaneously.

The game has different game modes, such a Battle Royale' mode where the last player standing wins or a team mode where the tactics and coordination of the players is the key to victory.

Acheron's Souls is a turn based game. In each turn you can send three actions (move, attack or defend). Heroes have special active and passive abilities that make each game have endless possibilities.

The battlefield will change throughout the game, activating traps that cause damage or altered states and that will make the player have to be in continuous movement.

To play Acheron’s Souls, players must download the free app available on the App Store and Google Play

- Use your mobile as a gamepad to control the fighters in the game.
- Select your favorite hero and choose your appearance for the battle.
- Learn to play by reading the guides and delve into the 'Lore' of the game.

name: Gunkour
description: GunKour is a fast paced, 8 player FPS game. Each character has a unique ability to defeat their opponents. All levels are uniquely designed to support wall running, triple jumping and wall hopping.

name: The Company Man
description: A 2D action-adventure where you can hit your crazy co-workers with a keyboard and shoot your evil bosses with emails. Survive the struggles of working life and fulfill your lifelong quest to be CEO!

name: SRX: The Game
description: Do you have what it takes to compete with the best of the best in the Superstar Racing Experience? SRX: The Game is your chance to prove it.

name: Temple of Hue
description: Temple of Hue is a 2D colour mixing puzzle game. Help the Jacklerats bring back colour to their dark world!

name: Horny Fantasy Girl Hentai
description: Join the game and get your hands on five incredible beauties. This game is a perfect combination of shooting range and gachi, implemented in the form of roulette Horny Fantasy Girl Hentai.

name: Color Dots Connect
description: Dot Connect is a simple fun line puzzle game. The goal is to connect all the same colored dots by drawing a line through the grid. All dots must be connected and all spaces on the game board must be filled with color to complete the level.

name: Drowned Gems
description: Drowned Gems is a 2d platformer game where the player in the underwater world shoots off fish scurrying in different directions and collects pearls that are scattered across the water levels.

name: Long Ago: A Puzzle Tale
description: Long Ago: A Puzzle Tale is a relaxing puzzle game combined with a modern fairy tale told in rhyme. Experience a beautiful colorful world and follow the story of a brave princess striving for freedom and adventure when everyone around her tries to keep her in line with the status quo.

name: Wonder Boy: Asha in Monster World Limited Edition
description:
Limited Edition includes:
Game
Manual (Mega Drive Style)
Reversible variant Cover
Individually numbered limited Edition (3500 NSW/1700 PS4)

name: Wonder Boy: Asha in Monster World Collector's Edition
description:
Game
Manual (Mega Drive Style)
Collector’s Edition Box
Two-sided Poster
Map
Two OSTs (Original + Remix)
Squishy Ball
Shikishi
Artbook
Arcylic Standee
Fridge Magnet
Stamper
Sticker
Individually numbered limited Edition (2500 NSW / 1200 PS4)

name: Wonder Boy: Asha in Monster World Mega Collector's Edition
description:
The Mega Collector's Edition contains:

Wonder Boy: Asha in Monster World with manual.
18 cm Figurine of Asha and Pepelogoo
Pixel Pin
Certificate of Authenticity
Mega-Drive/Genesis Style Box
Registration Card
Vinyl Sticker
Collector’s box with magnetic latch.
Two-sided Poster
Map
Two OSTs (Original + Remix)
Squishy Ball
Shikishi
Artbook
Arcylic Standee
Fridge Magnet
Stamper
Sticker
The original MW IV is included, but only available via Download-Code (EU-PSN-Account required).

name: Hide and Run
description: In Hide and Run players are divided into two teams. Props are trying to hide long as possible with hunters trying to find them.

name: 中国象棋-残局
description: "Chinese Chess-Endgame" is a casual chess game.

name: Route Me Mail and Delivery Co
description: A new delivery company has arrived on the scene! Route Me Mail and Delivery Co offers only the best in mail and parcel delivery services, 7 days a week! Complete various routes across multiple cities before your work day ends. Memorize your routes and knock them out in record time to become the best Postman that the company has ever seen. Upgrade your Postman's abilities and buy decorations for your house at the Route Me Shop. It's also a good idea to pay off your debts! Collect Hidden Mail and deliver Special Packages to increase your daily payout. Become the ultimate postman.

name: World Racing '95
description: Race like it's 1995! Classic arcade racing action for up to 4 players, a single player story mode packed with 30 tough missions and a cross-country highway with dozens of routes makes this one of the meanest racers around.

name: Trenga Unlimited
description: Choose the right pieces, place them into the tower and solve the puzzle! This is Trenga, a relaxing 3D puzzle game with a unique yet familiar mechanic. Help Kate Nemo and the cute sea creatures, challenging your friends and family or even your own brain, to complete tricky missions in the 3 beautiful worlds of this captivating underwater adventure.

name: Regina & Mac World
description: Regina and Mac are back in an all new, 2D adventure. On a quest to help their new friend Macbat (from Macbat 64) to find the purpose in his life, the dinosaur and the parrot jump, run, slide and dash through 100 level filled with secrets.

name: Super Toy Cars 2: Ultimate Racing
description: Sin descripción

name: World's End Club: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Pecaminosa: Collector's Edition
description:
Pecaminosa Collector's Edition includes:
- Base Game
- Soundtrack
- Notebook
- Poker Chips

name: UnearthU
description: UnearthU is a 7 day multimedia experience about self-improvement, healing, and transformation. Made by reusing found digital materials, the game consists of found footage videos, discussions with an A.I., guided meditations, writing reflection prompts, and a habit tracker.

name: Hyrule Warriors: Age of Calamity - Expansion Pass
description:
Two waves of downloadable content are coming in the Hyrule Warriors: Age of Calamity Expansion Pass DLC.

- Wave 1 - Pulse of the Ancients
Newly added playable character, new challenges, added weapon types, apocalyptic difficulty level, newly added challenge enemies

- Wave 2 - Guardian of Remembrance
New character vignettes, expanded roster, newly added stages, new battle skills for existing characters

name: Loopers
description: Loopers is a kinetic novel made by Ryukishi07 in collaboration with the visual novel studio Key.

name: Boy Beats World
description: Hit the beats to beat the bots and have a little adventure.

name: OAOA: Off and on Again
description: Off And On Again tells the story of a hero tasked with rebooting time. The game world is created and destroyed during play, with the hero having the ability to turn parts of the world off and on again. You will be required to use both brains and skill to overcome the enemies and obstacles in your path.

name: Slickpoo : The Clown
description: Single player stealth game with a horror background story

name: Shopping Clutter 10: The Walkers Take the Stage
description: Shopping Clutter returns with the 10th chapter in this favorite clutter franchise!

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: The Phantom of the Theater
description:
Version 4.8 of Honkai Impact 3rd, which includes:
• New Valkyrie: Starchasm Nyx (Seele)
• New Story Chapter XXIV: The Legion Theater
• New Featured Event: Stan Wars!
• ...and more!

name: Earth Defense Force: World Brothers - Cosmonaut: We'll Take the Planet as is!
description: Sin descripción

name: The Frog Prince
description:
Based on the fairy tale - "The Frog Prince".
High in the castle a princess awaits, you will have to plan your steps and find a way to bring the golden ball to her.
Use your long tongue to grab and swallow the golden ball, but beware, the ball is heavy.

name: Space Jam: A New Legacy - Full Court Pinball
description:
The Tune Squad is back and ready to slam dunk in the Full Court Pinball game! The characters of Space Jam are prepared to go back on the field, but this time, the basketball match is a bit different. Today's battle will take place on a pinball board, so you never know where the ball will land! Can you think of a strategy and help your friends win the game?

This is a classic challenge with an unusual twist, so it's your chance to show off your skills! To earn as many points as possible, you must throw the ball to your teammates and hit all the bumpers. Guide it all around the board, and don't let it escape to keep the battle going! Will you be able to set a new record?

name: Earth Defense Force: World Brothers - Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Engawa Danshi to Kemono Tan
description: Engawa Danshi to Kemono Tan is a romance simulation game developed by GANBARION Co.

name: G-Mode Archives+: Maou ga Ochiru Hi
description:
Until the final boss “Demon King” comes…minimum 5 minutes! ? Form the strongest party with your friends and intercept the Demon King!

“The Day the Demon King Falls” is an easy-to-use RPG that allows you to reach the ending in as little as 5 minutes.

According to the prophecy of the great god Odin, there is only one year left until the final boss, the Demon King, appears.

Grow your hero through training and adventures within a limited amount of time, and prepare for the coming demon lord.

Don't worry, the main character has 15 friends with unique personalities.

Depending on which characters you raise as your companions, your strategy and tactics in battle will change dramatically, and over 100 different events will occur in various locations such as training grounds and adventure grounds.

From events centered around friendship, love, and hate to events that are a bit more sexy, you'll be sure to discover new things every time you play.
And once you get into it, you'll discover the true secret hidden in the "Demon King"...

name: Process of Elimination
description: The Quartering Duke, an infamous serial killer with over a hundred victims, has thrown the country into chaos with his heinous acts. To bring an end to his killing spree, the “Detective Alliance,” composed of the country’s top detectives, has gathered to uncover and subdue him. However, in a series of unforeseen events, an aspiring yet unremarkable detective named Wato Hojo stumbles into their operations. He joins the Detective Alliance on the mysterious island of Morgue to investigate the Quartering Duke, only to make the gruesome discovery that their target lurks among them! Can these detectives prove their innocence and unveil the identity of the Quartering Duke before the case runs cold?

name: Carve Snowboarding
description:
The creator of 1080 Snowboarding is back with an all new snowboarding experience! Hit the slopes and encounter realistic arcade snowboarding like never before.
There's plenty of gear to find while you make your way through the mountain. Unlock new boards, gloves, and even mixtapes to explore the mountain in style! You can also chill in your cabin to check out your gear and load out for your next run.

name: Paradigm Paradox
description:
A superhero anime adventure with gender-bending romance!

Hero or Villain? Your choices determine the heroine’s side. But be careful, things are not always black and white...

Fight monsters and win love with eight different characters for you to grow closer to.

name: Para//ax
description:
Greetings, Operator! You're here because you have agreed to operate a PARA//AX class robot for this mission. It's simple, you need to get in, get to the core, and destroy it. Sounds easy enough, right?

Though, there is one thing we've noticed... Every time we send a different bot in there, the layout of the ship changes. Whether this is because of some sort of nanotechnology, hologram, or magic, it shouldn't be a problem for you. We're sure you have all of the tools you need to handle unfamiliar environments.

name: Action Commando
description: As a time travelling Spartan Soldier, you must stop the Cult of the Fallen Gods that are turning people into burger meat. Grab your sword and assault cannon and deal death to these disfigured freaks in the name of humanity.

name: Circular
description: Circular is an arcade scoring game.

name: Earth Defense Force: World Brothers - The Legendary Mr. Y, Reborn as "Mecha Yuki" After His Acid Incident!?
description: This allows you to use a special character and that character's weapon. There was once a soldier who defended the Earth valiantly against the Invaders until he was defeated.

name: Earth Defense Force: World Brothers - Colonist: "We'll Help, If It Means Saving the Planet"!?
description: This allows you to use a special character and that character's weapon. The Colonists who invaded the planet in "Earth Defense Force 5" have rushed to join the fight.

name: Earth Defense Force: World Brothers - Saki, the Crazed Little Sister Swordswoman from "OneeChanbara"
description: This allows you to use a special character and that character's weapon. Saki, the crazed swordswoman from the zombie-infested world of "OneeChanbara," is here and ready to fight using her super long katana and acrobatics.

name: Earth Defense Force: World Brothers - Aya, the Calm Big Sister Swordswoman from "OneeChanbara"
description: This allows you to use a special character and that character's weapon. Aya, the calm and composed swordswoman from the zombie-infested world of "OneeChanbara," has joined the fight, wearing not only her trademark 10-gallon hat and bikini, but also with a katana as her weapon.

name: Conan Exiles: Isle of Siptah
description: Isle of Siptah is a massive expansion to the open world survival game Conan Exiles, featuring a vast new island to explore, huge and vile new creatures to slay, new building sets and a host of new features.

name: Invincible Cleopatra: Caesar's Dreams
description: Help Cleopatra find the amulet of dreams and stop the war

name: Conan Exiles: Isle of Siptah Edition
description: Get both the Conan Exiles base game and the massive Isle of Siptah expansion!

name: Conan Exiles: Savage Edition
description: Get a great start into Conan Exiles with the Savage Edition! It gives a wealth of content and two vast maps to explore, settle and conquer!

name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms XIII: Scenario for War Chronicles Mode - 5th Wave: The Battle for Yan Province
description: An additional scenario for the War Chronicles mode of the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV: Diplomacy and Strategy Expansion Pack Bundle".

name: Zen Cube
description: Zen Cube a game where your hobby will be your greatest fun. The Zen cube arose from the idea of the Zen Chess game that allows the player to perform only the checkmate of the chess move, with the Zen Cube you can make the last 2 moves to finish the Magic Cube.

name: Classic Jigsaw Puzzles: Beautifully Illustrated
description: This puzzle game helps your kids develop matching and fine motor skills. Your children will just love these wonderfully hand-drawn pictures and will improve their spatial skills while having fun!

name: Bike Baron 2
description: Bike Baron 2 is a wild motorbike racer packed with monster jumps and explosive hazards. It mixes platforming and puzzle elements with over-the-top physics and pixel-perfect controls. There's no better way to unleash your inner daredevil than to crash your bike from the safety of your room.

name: Sweety Little Witch
description: Sweety Little Witch is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Pog 2
description: Cute, minimal physical puzzle.

name: Versus: The Deathscapes
description: When a new threat emerges on planet Versus, you and your allies are forced to explore the dreaded Deathscapes to survive.

name: Battle Alchemy
description: You apprentice and heir of the great magician-alchemist, but, unfortunately, after his death, all the burden of worries and protection of the castle with the surrounding lands fell on your shoulders. As it turned out, the neighboring lords, having learned about the death of your mentor, decided that now the surrounding lands were left...
